original_title: Paramore: Live at The LG Arena
overview: Following a sell-out UK tour in December 2009, Paramore returned to British shores for a second jaunt, promising to be "bigger... and better". This cold Tuesday evening in MId-November saw thousands of fans - both young and old - pile into Birmingham's recently renovated LG Arena for a searing night of Rock 'n Roll.
tagline: Recorded at The LG Arena, Birmingham at 16th November 2010
title: Paramore: Live at The LG Arena
